snippet.title: Lawyer Jonathan Shulak, of Devine Schachter Polak comments on the Hague Convention
snippet.description:
Lawyer Jonathan Shulak, of Devine Schachter Polak comments on the Hague Convention
Toegevoegd door TheGazette vorig jaar
Lawyer Jonathan Shulak, of Devine Schachter Polak comments on the Hague Convention and how it needs to look to the specifics of each case in order to take into consideration the best interests of the child.
10 views

snippet.title: Service of Legal Process Ireland-Hague Convention
snippet.description:
Service of Legal Process Ireland-Hague Convention
Toegevoegd door elgransenor 2 jaren geleden
http://BusinessAndLegal.ie If you need to have legal papers or process served in Ireland under the Hague Convention procedure to ensure the success of your litigation you would be well advised to use an Irish solicitor to look after it for you.
11 views

snippet.title: Hague Service Convention in Ireland
snippet.description:
Hague Service Convention in Ireland
Toegevoegd door elgransenor 2 jaren geleden
http://BusinessAndLegal.ie Hague convention service in Ireland can be effected in a number of ways but the most cost effective and safest method is by instructing an Irish solicitor. Service by mail may leave you with a judgment which is unenforceable and direct request from the Central Authority can be slow and cumbersome due to the growing demands on the Office.
8 views

snippet.title: The Hague prepares for Nuclear Security Summit
snippet.description:
The Hague prepares for Nuclear Security Summit
Toegevoegd door Zoomin.TV Canada laatste maart
In preparations for the 2014 Nuclear Security Summit that is taking place in The Hague on the 24 and 25 of March, the political and royal home of the Netherlands is undergoing a transformation to become the safest place in the world. 58 world leaders are expected to arrive to the Netherlands for the international forum.
341 340 views

snippet.title: Restaurant Bodega de Posthoorn, The Hague, Netherlands. 1080 HD.
snippet.description:
Restaurant Bodega de Posthoorn, The Hague, Netherlands. 1080 HD.
Toegevoegd door Beekeeper Stories laatste oktober
Music by The Flanger Sound -"On my old Ford of 1939". Creative Commons. Right in the heart of The Hague, on the graceful tree-lined Lange Voorhout, is the Bodega de Posthoorn. A cozy cafe-restaurant, you can stop in for a beer, a coffee, some delicious Dutch pea soup, or a full meal. You always feel welcome. When you walk in the door, you feel like you have stepped in to someone's home -- or back into a better and more generous time. The Bodega's site is unbeatable: From its terrace under the canopy of trees, you can gaze across the street to the swan-filled lake in front of the stately Parliament, or across the square at an elegant line of historic mansions -- one of which was the Queen's palace, and is now a remarkable museum devoted to the brain-teasing art of M.C. Escher. The Bodega is a singular place -- come take a look. Disclosure: This was not a commercial project. I did not receive any pay, nor did I get free food. I did, however, get lots of free cappuccinos, which made for some very caffeinated filming sessions. Acknowledgments: My deepest gratitude to Michael Meeuwisse -- owner of the Bodega de Posthoorn -- who not only kindly allowed me to film his restaurant, but took an unjustified risk by participating in my film. Canon t3i/600D. Lenses: Canon 24/1.4L; 85/1.8; Tokina 11-16/2.8. Gitzo tripod and Flycam Nano.
8 835 views

snippet.title: William Hague "très préoccupé" par la situation en Centrafrique
snippet.description:
William Hague "très préoccupé" par la situation en Centrafrique
Toegevoegd door Agence France-Presse 3 weken geleden
Un mini-sommet sur la Centrafrique, co-organisé par la France sur fond de regain de violence dans ce pays africain, ouvre mercredi le 4ème sommet UE-Afrique à Bruxelles, au lendemain du lancement par l'UE de sa mission militaire à Bangui. Durée: 00:33
